website_summaries.verdict: The Propet Stability X Strap is an everyday walking shoe designed to deliver comfort to wearers. The wide strap closure ensures complete foot lockdown while also permitting the ease of on and off action. Overall, this model is highly recommended by people with foot and mobility issues because it is quick to put on.
pros: A majority of the users find the Propet Stability X Strap comfortable for all-day wear
Almost all of the individuals who suffer from neuropathy, edema, bunions, and hammertoes experience relief while wearing this pair of walking shoes
Many reviewers love that this model is easy to put on, remove, and adjust
The grip offered by the outsole satisfies a bunch of owners
According to a good number of consumers, this trainer is breathable and suitable for summer use
The lightweight nature of the footwear makes for easy walking, states plenty of folks
Plenty of wearers appreciate the roomy toe box of this shoe
Numerous buyers rave about the attractive style of this product
cons: Several people have noticed that the Stability X Strap feels tight where the tongue attaches to the shoe
The fabric lining inside this Propet walking footwear developed holes after a few weeks of use, says a few owners

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as the rest of the shoe where the tongue is sewn into the shield in that area
customer_reviews.text: Snug around where the tounge is sewn into the shoe, if it was a little bit wider in that area they would be perfect. I suffer from venous insufficiency in a lot of swelling in my legs and feet and I figured these shoes would help out a lot I have yet to wear them throughout the day that sitting here with them on they are tight around the tops of my feet where the tongue meets the shoe plenty of room in the toe area and feels okay around the ankles and heel needs to be just a hair bit wider and that area where the tongue meets the shoe and it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for Disabled
customer_reviews.text: Had to exchange for larger size. My husband has PD & these shoes with Velcro straps fit his need perfectly. Tie shoes where becoming difficult for him. He loves them. They feel good on his foot. Because there is only one strap, it doesn’t show style of shoe so much & avoids bringing attention to his need for straps. Shoes are well made & have good support, especially on heal. Highly recommend these shoes for anyone who can no longer or have difficulty tieing shoes. Shoe is also very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Em Ay

customer_reviews.title: Have to revise my review! To a 5 Star Review!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fell apart after just a few uses but after I left the review the company reached out to me and sent me a brand new pair. These have withstood the test of time and very heavy use! Couldn't ask for a better pair of shoes, nor a more durable pair. They are so easy to put on and take off. My son is handicapped and can easily get them off which in other shoes has been a struggle. Thanks so much for making a great pair of shoes, well worth the purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was unaware of this brand till I saw it at Amazon. Tried it and another brand under the Prime Wardrobe program. It was very comfortable so I bought the pair. I walk 3 miles per day. The fit and comfort are superior. The Velcro is easy to use. Well worth the price. Prime Wardrobe makes it a very pleasant buying experience.
customer_reviews.author: Miles River

customer_reviews.title: Only order one size larger or regret your buy!
customer_reviews.text: They get you with the low price but, to get the best buy you need to order at least one size larger and wider to fit. They double the price for those shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: lee reinsmith

customer_reviews.title: Quality not as good as usual.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seems to be a good shoe. It has enough room and seems to be well made. It has no arch support that I can detect so I had to put a good arch support in it. Propet seems to be cutting back on the quality of its products. I have worn their shoes for years and I can see a backward step being taken on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you wear Orthotics...order 2 sizes wider than what you would normally wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this shoes but, I had to return them for a larger width. He usually wears an X-wide because his feet swell. Thought that would be enough, nope, had to return them for an XX-wide. Hopefully, these will work a lot better for him. These are great shoes, lightweight and he said supportive except for his orthotic being put in and foot swelling, way too tight. Keeping my fingers crossed that the XX-wide will be good for him.
customer_reviews.author: CJFoley

customer_reviews.title: Good GRAB-N-GO shoe
customer_reviews.text: More like a spipper than a shoe. EASY ON/OFF. PLENTY OF ROOM & NO BINDING. FABRIC GETS DIRTY REALLY QUICKLY OUTDOORS. Any water goes right thru. Very lightweight. After 5 months sole has not split yet as others have reported. Basically a cheap not very durable, convenient, loose fitting no-tie shoe with handy removable insoles. IMO worth about 25 & not the 58 I paid or the typical 98ish reg price. I bot several. BOTTOM LINE: Earns ****4**** Stars!
customer_reviews.author: carefulShopper

customer_reviews.title: still is warm when wearing
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the sizing is and the adjustment available. is still much like leather shoes and is very warm. most likely I will wear these in the Florida winters. and I do like the fit and feel on my feet! as my one foot is 2 sizes wider then the other. I would buy them again as the price is very good
customer_reviews.author: Martin Harris

customer_reviews.title: These are the most comfortable shoes I own.
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy and lymph-edema in my feet. Most shoes cause bad sores on my feet. These do not. And they slip on and off like slippers; but aren't too loose. These are the most comfortable shoes I own. I highly recommend these shoes if you have neuropathy in your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Max C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in dementia care at an assisted living facility so I purchased these shoes for him to try. He loves them. They are lightweight, comfortable to walk in and so very easy for him to put on by himself. He has worn them since early spring and they are holding up very well. This is his favorite and he won't wear anything else right now! So glad I found them to make life easier for him.
customer_reviews.author: SUZI

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these!! They are just too tight in several places. I know I am hard to fit for shoes, but these shoes are tight in areas where most shoes fit me fine.
customer_reviews.author: SKYGUY

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes. My Dad has difficulty finding shoes that ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. My Dad has difficulty finding shoes that are wide enough for him since he retains water. These are great. Easy for him to put on and comfortable to wear all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Good for edema
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my dad who has neuropathy and edema on his feet and legs. The doctor prescribed these braces and we could not find shoes that would accommodate them. He liked them but the straps were a little short. If he didn't have to wear the braces they would have fit fine but those things are very bulky.
customer_reviews.author: MeAn77

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: My feet get swollen pretty fast and it is hard for me to walk in regular shoes, I also have wide feet which affects the size and comfortability of regular shoes. These shoes helps with adjusting the top to the size of your feet, hope that makes sense. But it fits perfect and they are very comfortable. I like that there are many options of sizes and width I got the Xtra wide since my feet get swollen. Also what I like about these shoes is that they have a strap so it is easier for me to bend over and just strap it, no need to tie your shoe lace.
customer_reviews.author: salvador Perez

customer_reviews.title: Careful to order right size
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these shoes. The only thing is the left one has an issue where my heal goes. It is either not the same size or my foot is not the same size. The back of the ankle bent and will not restore. And why did the price go up by $20. I was going to order another pair in black, but now.
customer_reviews.author: vato

customer_reviews.title: Perfect velcro strap
customer_reviews.text: Husband has swollen feet that vary from day to day. Large velcro strap allows easy daily adjustment. Good grip soles and breathable shoe material. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad......
customer_reviews.text: I have to say these are some very comfortable shoes, I am so glad that I followed my gut and brought them. They fit me excellent even though I ware a leg brace, it hard to find wide shoes to fit me. So do yourself a favor and purchase these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Roomy for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband who is a diabetic. Normally he wears a 3X but bought this 5x due to feet swelling in the summer heat. They fit perfectly and the velcro strap is easy for him to manage. he states they are extremely comfy. He also has very bad hammer toes and these allowed plenty of room without any pressure. Great buy. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Retired RN

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my father. He was looking for some shoes with Velcro and I came across these. He loved them, the width was perfect and exactly what he was looking for. The gray color is a nice shade, not too light or dark. He has me watching for the other colors to come back in stock in his size
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair & I love these. Comfortable to stand & walk in & still allows you to feel the ground so you know when your foot is on something solid.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great supporting sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Propet sneakers I have bought. I wear them constantly, I truly enjoy them. People have asked me frequently, where did you get those? They have great support, the one strap close is awesome and secure. Good value for the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: hookbill

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly extra wide.
customer_reviews.text: These were a bit tighter than expected. They should have fit and they are tight. Not the best for deep feet.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: heel wears out fast on inside
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of walking at job, about eighty miles, the inside of heel was worn to frame, fabric developed hole.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Riley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on/off - great for people that have hard time putting on shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has good depth at heel, which my husband needs. My husband walks with a shuffle - so I do expect soles of shoes to wear quickly - but these soles seem to have worn VERY quickly...within a few months, the heels are completely smooth. Still love the ease to put the shoes on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker for money, easy to put on.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Easy to insert feet. Ad said XX wide equal to 6E. Shoes say 5E, so a bit tighter than expected, but fit my need as a back up pair to my Drew shoes at half the price. Ordered a 2nd pair in grey, as my shoe size and width hard to find. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald K. Fern

customer_reviews.title: One of the best style orthotic shoes I've worn
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great I wear a size 14 3X and I have a neuropathy called CIDP which greatly affects my balance and stride. I've tried a lot of different shoes some supplied by the VA but I bought these on my own and even though I use VA supplied AFOs they are fantastic. I would highly recommend anyone with orthotic issues take a look at the shoes
customer_reviews.author: thunderthroat

customer_reviews.title: perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THESE FOR MY FATHER FOR HIS BIRTHDAY. HE LOVES THEM AND WAS REALLY LOVED THE FIT AND COMFORT OF THEM. THE WIDER SOLE ON THE SHOE PROVIDES EXTRA STABILITY WHICH WAS A PLUS. SO PLEASED.
customer_reviews.author: DEENA D DUNDON

customer_reviews.title: BAD CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of sneakers. they did not fit my normal size I wanted to exchange them for a larger size. apparently this is not an option allowed The only recourse offered was to return the item for a refund-minus $15.08.I
customer_reviews.author: TEX BORDEN

customer_reviews.title: Stiching coming apart.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fit and support, shoes very comfortable. However, the shoes are only 8 months old, purchased just February of this year, and the stiching that held the right shoe closure strap on has come apart. My wife had to sew it back on. Now the strap on the left shoe is coming off because the stitching is coming apart. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Hoy

customer_reviews.title: Fit Dad’s 9AA foot!
customer_reviews.text: It has always been extremely difficult to find shoes to fit Dad’s 9AA feet. By using the Velcro closure, these are narrow and apparently comfortable for a 93-year-old man. He would even like to sleep with them on! He needed shoes that would not slip on the tile floor of his assisted living room, but they also needed to be easy to get on and off. These shoes really fit those requirements. This is the second pair I have ordered from Propet. I chose black this time. The first pair was navy. I have been very pleased with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, very stable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a great fit. My husband feels very stable on his feet after knee and spine surgery. He is able to get them on easily. They are lightweight and comfortable. He is very happy with this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jnprmoon

customer_reviews.title: finally, an easy shoe to put on
customer_reviews.text: Seniors with nephropathy or knee problems. here is a shoe you can easily put on. its comfortable to weaR. Old sndals went in the garbage,
customer_reviews.author: Scrimshaw77

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe except closure wears out fast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother, who is physically and mentally handicapped. They fit great and so easy for him to put on. However, after four months the Velcro straps have failed/worn out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for the elderly who have difficulty securing their shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the shoe because they are light weight and comfortable. The hook and loop single strap is the best feature making the shoe easy to secure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Discount engineering can be a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but One piece velcro is difficult make a secure binding, and my heal slips out while walking.
customer_reviews.author: MagnificentMood

customer_reviews.title: X-Strap comes loose
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well made EXCEPT for the fact the straps seem to short and come loose. I am not very active, I use a walker. My feet are not swollen at all, the straps just seem about an inch short where they adhere to the pads. I couldn't imagine running in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rp

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Good looks.
customer_reviews.text: My husband can’t tolerate a high arch support and this shoe was just right for him! They look nice and he enjoys wearing them on a daily basis. I’ll be getting some different colors for him now.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for father with adema and it fit wonderfully and solved the issue of getting shoes on/off. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Asha

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light weight sharp sneak runs small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend that's blind so he normally wears an 11 1/2 but, they we're tight so I reordered a 12 for him and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Helene from WV

customer_reviews.title: GOOD AVERAGE SHOES-over priced
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes Very comfy and easy to put on and the quality is there just way overpriced
customer_reviews.author: J. Kilbourne

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: I have but g feet. They fit great. I ordered one size up and 3x wide. Fit perfect. My feet are happy.
customer_reviews.author: joseph rosiles

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Class!  For not a lot of cash.
customer_reviews.text: If this was for my stomach I’d say it was sweet. But since it’s not they are Rolls Royce for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Easter

customer_reviews.title: Good for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Sizing and quality are good for the price. I wear 1.5 3or 4x wide; depending on shoe. One strap makes for easy on/off and adjustment for edema.
customer_reviews.author: yooper7

customer_reviews.title: You'd think a brand like Propet would size things for people with foot problems
customer_reviews.text: You'd think a brand like Propet would size things for people with foot problems. The only reason I'm not returning them is they do fit a close friend.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Nocera

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light. My only complaint is that the tongues slip down because they are only padded at the top. Otherwise a great shoe at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: fatchancemn

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the Perfect Shoe that I have e ver bought. It is a plus because you can put a Orthopedic in place of the Sole. I have a hard foot to fit. Thru Diabetes I had my Big Toe Amputated. These Shoes Fit Perfectly for my. It fits perfect on my foot that has four toes and fits perfect on my other foot that has all my toes. I will order another with a different color. it is good because your feet breaths really well.
customer_reviews.author: J A

customer_reviews.title: Worked well with narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: My dad has really narrow feet and has trouble finding shoes. The Velcro on these made them work great
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR GOUT/WIDE FEET
customer_reviews.text: awesome find, especially for these gouty feet....will test it out for a couple months before a final verdict, but Propet hasn't failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous_coconut

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My husband says these are extreamly comfortable and the numbing and tingling in his feet are gone.
customer_reviews.author: friend

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable everyday shoe. Just remember to order one width up from normal.
customer_reviews.author: Don L.

customer_reviews.title: Goos fit
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and my husband was able to wear it immediately without any discomfort. He is very pleased with everything about the shoe and price.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable and easy to put on for my 93 year old father.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen C.

customer_reviews.title: Have to use inserts.
customer_reviews.text: I like the slip on style for sure. I ordered a wide because I was planning on using orthopedic inserts. And you will also probably have to use inserts, whether orthopedic or just gel, because the padding in these shoes is pretty thin.
customer_reviews.author: yates sensei

customer_reviews.title: Fits
customer_reviews.text: Finally a shoe that fits my long narrow foot! Very hard time finding a shoe that fits. Most are way too wide.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. May

customer_reviews.title: Chinese garbage !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Low quality product! Has been returned! The seller pulls a refund! I will not buy it anymore! This size does not match. It used to be orthopedic shoes, now it's Chinese garbage !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Velcro shoes.
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy and barely wore them yet but they seem fine and fit OK. Look good.
customer_reviews.author: M. Greenleaf

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband for walking stability and the one strap Velcro makes for easy on and off
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: My 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: This model has worked well for me so I bought a 3rd color. Will likely become my new 'go to' walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S. Palter

customer_reviews.title: Not that wide
customer_reviews.text: I only wear Propet, and this one seems, even at 5e, to be way to narrow for me to wear, even at 16 5e.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: U-G-L-Y
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back right away. They were way too big and very unattractive.l
customer_reviews.author: FatherFlower

customer_reviews.title: Was like wearing flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't tighten shoe to my foot. Was like wearing flip-flops. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for seniors
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my dad who is in his 80's. He was having a hard time loosening laces on his big bulky sneakers to try and get them on. These have a velcro strap and open up wide. He loved them so much I'm pretty sure he wore them to bed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert and Zorelys Santilli

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Dad. He’s hard to fit and said these fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Best Made Shoe for My Dad!
customer_reviews.text: They Fit my dad Perfect, He has edema in his feet, ankles and you couldn't ask for a better made shoe for his problem, thank you for thinking of the Senior community when it comes to shoes for his needs!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FITTING SHOES
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful shoes for a person who has a narrow foot and hates to tie shoestrings!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara W. Schwanke

customer_reviews.title: “Just Right”
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these sneakers. He has a wide foot and difficulty finding a “just right” fit. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. W

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small In My Opininion
customer_reviews.text: This is the first wide sneaker I ever bought and even though I could get my foot in it with a shoe horn, it was painfully tight. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: AdirondackKid

customer_reviews.title: Easier to put on than a tie shoe
customer_reviews.text: Ok shoe, we were looking for something that would work for swollen foot after surgery.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: no comment
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great in appearance and fit. However there is a tab on the flap that serves no purpose and is easily mistaken as a lift for the velcro and if pulled easily rips yjt top of the flap
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable for all day on my feet. Legs don't ache as much. On concrete or dirt most of the day. Will keep this brand in mind for future purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Martin Chaplinski

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Thin insole!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits well and looks great but for the price the insole is thin and cheap which ruins the overall rating for this item. This product would be an excellent item if the manufacturer put more work on comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Joe N. Heard Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Jury is still out.
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out. Haven't worn them half a day yet. Looks like a good quality shoe..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good fit, better than most. Reasonably attractive for a hook and loop shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie686

customer_reviews.title: Shoe has one strap
customer_reviews.text: Love the single strap but hard for me to pull tight because I have one arm/hand.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting supporting shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes offer a wode sole and heel to support my weight
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Just didn’t fit me.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get strap to close. My foot was/is too swollen.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my ankles and putting shoes on is a pain. The Velcro straps make them sooo easy to put on!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly L. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and great support.
customer_reviews.text: The width is great for use with an orthotic. Easy to put on with very good support.
customer_reviews.author: BL inTexas

customer_reviews.title: May want to order up a size or 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for a friend of mine who's having foot problem. He said he was glad I got a 12 because at the toe they would have been tight other than that he loves them. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: S Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Dad loves these shoes! So easy to put on & take off. He wants another color now.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia w estrada

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, very light & plenty of room. Just got them so I'll see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: MUCH to small. Smaller than a size 11 & 12 5E (xx) in another brand. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Schultz

customer_reviews.title: A Little Loose... But Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: They fit a tad bit loose around the ankle and heel area, but they are comfortable. It's hard finding shoes in my size, so I've learned to make SOME compromises.
customer_reviews.author: Atam

customer_reviews.title: A shoe that fits!
customer_reviews.text: I need narrow shoes at a reasonable price. This worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The ightness the tongue least it should have been fully padded
customer_reviews.author: josephpetrella

customer_reviews.title: did not fit right. Heel to low, foot flopped out when walking.
customer_reviews.text: Only received 2/ 3rds back of the original cost. Was never told they would keep money out of the cost of the shoe when returned because they did not fit. Will never order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Fern Robichaud

customer_reviews.title: These are comfortable and gave him sure footing when
customer_reviews.text: My husband feet are swollen because of the chemo treatments he takes. These are comfortable and gave him sure footing when walking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He seems to like them and they look really good on him
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my husband who had 2 strokes and is currently and rehab and needed comfy shoes to sit in and begin to learn and walk. He seems to like them and they look really good on him.
customer_reviews.author: Mwalk

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walk around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoe to wear around. Like the velcro strap over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Commdrdave

customer_reviews.title: Finally truly wide shoes!
customer_reviews.text: After sending back several pairs of supposedly wide shoes this pair finally fit with comfort. Will look to Propet agin when in need of wide shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: Poor Velcro Quality!! Didn’t last two months!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of this exact shoe that I have purchased in less than 6 months. The Velcro is made of poor quality and frayed. This pair didn’t last 2 months before not working at all. Will not be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Jones

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears to work really comfortable. Doesnt like strap across foot cant make tighter
customer_reviews.author: blueshoe

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a 1/2 size big to wear at the gym. PERFECT! Item was as described and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: David C. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Product came quickly. Took it immediately to person in nursing home. Seems to be helping him walk better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and style very good. Unfortunately they were too wide for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about the sneaker the fit for my husband was not good. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase if you have arthritis in your hands because you will never get a tight fit
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could choose 0 Stars instead of one. There's no way to get a tight fit on these. The way the velcro is design on these shoes it leaves you with very loose fitting shoes when you try to tighten them.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitrios H.

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves how good his feet feel wearing these
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cetera

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes to wear when I go to the gym. I wear AFO’s and I needed a shoes that they would fit into that didn’t cost a lot. When I found these all I could say is Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size in mens shoe for a woman
customer_reviews.text: The size our 80 year old aunt would order in woman's did not fit, so she ordered a different style which was for men. They were very nice shoes for a man, and the color was great.
customer_reviews.author: Lindal

product_meta.title: Propét Men's Stability X Strap Sneaker, Navy, 5.5 UK
product_meta.description: This shoe has a mesh upper with brushed-nylon lining and padded collar and tongue. The pu insole has a gel heel pad and cushioning ridges for maximum comfort. The eva midsole is arch-supporting, and the outsole is rubber for durable wear and traction.
feature_bullets: Double insoles - with the Propet EV (Extra Volume) insole system, customized fit and comfort is easy
Features a footbed that can be removed to accommodate custom orthotics
Adjustable hook and loop strap closure
